Summary: I did'nt even know it was there till I took a close up look at the photo
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw that the sun looked really strange through the smoke of the California fires so I grabbed my camera to take some pics to send to my Brother via the web. I took about 8 shots before calling it good because Im not that good of a photographer and I wanted to pick the best of the bunch to send. After downloading them to my Computer I went in to preview them in more of a closeup format. The first pic had nothing but the red sun and the sky and trees.The second pic which I took about 2 sec's after the first had a tube like thing hovering close to the sun. The third pic once again had nothing but the sky and setting sun and again it was taken about 2 sec's after the previous one. So within a few seconds it came and went. I am not one to make up stories,nor do I go out of my way to bother people uselessly but I remembered your commercial and thought you might be interested in at least taking a look at it and maybe letting me know what you think. Sincerely. Dale H Herring. P.S. I was at home when this occured.I am sending the first three pics in the order that I took them. Look very closely at the 2nd one close to the sun.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Talent
There were no other sightings in Talent on or around June 30th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
